---
title: Ichthyosaur Occurrences
author: Benjamin Moon
---

```{r download_pbdb_data}
ichthyosaur_pbdb_url <- paste0(
  "https://paleobiodb.org/data1.2/occs/", # API for occurrence data
  "list.txt?",                            # text file
  "interval=Permian,Paleogene",           # time interval of interest
  "&base_name=Ichthyosauromorpha",        # search for ichthyosaurs
  "&idreso=species",                      # include only species
  "&pres=regular",                        # return only body fossils
  "&show=full"                            # return full PBDB entry
)
ichthyosaur_pbdb_occurrences <- read.csv(
  ichthyosaur_pbdb_url,
  head = TRUE
)
ichthyosaur_pbdb_filename <- paste0(
  "ichthyosaur_pbdb_occurrences_",
  format(Sys.time(), format = "%Y-%m-%d-%H-%M-%S"),
  ".tsv"
)
write.table(
  ichthyosaur_pbdb_occurrences,
  file = ichthyosaur_pbdb_filename,
  sep  = "\t",
  row.names = FALSE,
  col.names = TRUE
)
```
